entry.title: Switching to Octopress
entry.content:
Yes, at least for now, I've decided that I was tired of dealing with Wordpress. In an effort to lower my costs and headache for owning and operating a personal blog, Octopress paired with Jekyll seemed like an awesome alternative for someone who enjoys writing in plain text as much as myself.

I was inspired by a couple of folks to make the switch. All in all, it was actually not too bad once I got the latest version of Ruby and RVM setup on my Mac.

EDIT

It's also worthy to note that I used exitwp to migrate my wordpress content into markdown. I realize there are a few bugs that I need to iron out and will do that soon.

Furthermore, check out http://pages.github.com/ if you are ever interested in free static stite hosting on github. Seems pretty good for a personal blog setup.
